product_meta.title: New Waterless Dog Shampoo | All Natural Dry Shampoo for Dogs or Cats No Rinse Required | 100% Non-Toxic with Natural Extract | Vet Approved Treatment - Made in USA - 1 Bottle 8oz (240ml)
feature_bullets: FAST YET EFFECTIVE CLEAN No time for a bath? No problem! Our waterless shampoo gets pets clean quickly, leaving fur smelling great and feeling soft. Our natural dry shampoo gets rid of unpleasant pet smells instantly and is great for pets who dislike water. Its more effective than wipes and can be used to spot treat accidents or for a full body cleanse. Its portable, making it convenient for traveling. It also works great as a detangler and leaves coat silky smooth and shiny after brushing.

FORMULATED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Our dry pet shampoo is extremely gentle making it an excellent shampoo for animals with allergies and other sensitivities. Our all natural water-less shampoo spray is 100% detergent and alcohol free and 100% non-toxic. Its a safe alternative to other cleansers that contain harsh chemicals. Our hypoallergenic pet shampoo does NOT CONTAIN parabens, sulphates, SLS or stripping Ethyl alcohol.

AWARD-WINNING QUALITY: Winner of the 2020 Family Choice Awards. A coveted consumer award program recognizing outstanding pet products while enriching the lives of our fur friends. Our Lavender Waterless Shampoo offers safe professional quality for dogs, cats, puppies, kittens, ferrets, guinea pigs, rabbits, and horses of all ages with normal or sensitive skin. We stand behind the quality of our products.

LAVENDER FRESH SCENT: A wonderful fresh aroma makes this dry bath a pleasant experience for you and your pet! Our waterless shampoo has a light lavender scent that leaves your pet smelling fresh for days. It is perfect to freshen up your pet in between baths or trips to the groomer. Our formula is not harsh on your hands or your pet. This spray can also be used to freshen up bedding, car interiors, upholstery, or anywhere pet odors linger.

OUR ETHICAL FAMILY COMMITMENT: Proudly made in the USA using socially responsible practices, locally sourced and sustainable ingredients, animal cruelty free production and eco-friendly recyclable packaging. We are a small family owned business of pet lovers committed to making great products that are safe for you, your pets and the planet!
